snippet: The NBC singing show has experienced a ratings decline for six straight weeks on TV's most competitive night, which means it can no longer be considered a threat to topple "American Idol" as the weekly ratings winner.
abstract: The NBC singing show has experienced a ratings decline for six straight weeks on TV's most competitive night, which means it can no longer be considered a threat to topple "American Idol" as the weekly ratings winner.

headline.main: 'The Voice' Still Leads on Monday, Even as Viewership Slowly Erodes
